string-array.name: protection_slogan
string-array.item: REMEMBER!\nDon\'t be silly, protect your willy!
REMEMBER!\nIf you\'re not going to sack it, go home and whack it!
REMEMBER!\nIf you have an erection, and don\'t want an infection, you better use protection, on your genital section!
REMEMBER!\nIf you don’t cover when you penetrate, you’ll be left to masturbate!
REMEMBER!\nIf you really love her, wear a cover!
